lesson.subtitle: Agreement & Disagreement
lesson.description: Learner can express agreement at different levels of intensity
objectives: Learner can express agreement at different levels of intensity
Learner can express polite disagreement in formal and informal contexts
Learner can participate in debates using appropriate vocabulary
grammarFocus: expression patterns for agreement and disagreement

words.en: not at all, by no means
